text: West Irving station is a Trinity Railway Express commuter rail and bus station in Irving, Texas. It is located at Jackson Street near Esters Road and serves Irving Mall with connecting bus service to Las Colinas and North Lake College. It opened on November 13, 2000. Unlike many rail stations, West Irving does not have an indoor heating/cooling facility, nor does it have a station attendant. However, it does have passenger shelters for bus and TRE riders. ==References== ==External links== * TRE - West Irving Station * DART - Dallas Area Rapid Transit Category:Trinity Railway Express stations West Irving (TRE station) Category:Railway stations in the United States opened in 2000 Category:Railway stations in Dallas County, Texas Category:Transportation in Irving, Texas
title: West Irving station
